abstract: New Major League Baseball Commissioner Robert Manfred believes technology is key to attracting younger fans; offers his opinion on some controversial topics, including designated hitters, day games in World Series, advertisements on uniforms and more.
lead_paragraph: Robert Manfred wants M.L.B. to be more of a presence at the amateur level and also has an interest in reaching out to fans “with information via technology.”
snippet: Robert Manfred wants M.L.B. to be more of a presence at the amateur level and also has an interest in reaching out to fans “with information via technology.”

headline.main: New Commissioner With a Long-Term Mission
headline.seo: Robert Manfred Is Determined to Steer Young People Toward Baseball
headline.print_headline: New Commissioner Is Determined to Steer Young People Toward Sport
